com.ad4screen.sdk

Class Inbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ad4screen.sdk.Inbox

  • public class Inbox
extends java.lang.Object
    This inbox contains all messages requested by a developer for one or more users.
    You can update this inbox and these messages
    As soon as you want to commit your updates, send this object to Ad4Screen Servers with updateMessages.
    Please see : Using Inbox
    See Also:
    A4S
